scripts.build: npm run build:clients && npm run build:shell
scripts.ngx-build-plus:copy-assets: node copy-wc-polyfill.js && node copy-bundles.js && node projects/client-a/copy-bundles.js && node projects/client-b/copy-bundles.js
scripts.build:clients: npm run build:client-a && npm run build:client-b
scripts.build:client-a: ng build --prod --single-bundle --project client-a --output-hashing none --vendor-chunk false --output-path src/assets/micro-frontends/client-a
scripts.build:client-b: ng build --prod --single-bundle --project client-b --output-hashing none --vendor-chunk false --output-path src/assets/micro-frontends/client-b
scripts.build:client-a:externals: ng build --extra-webpack-config webpack.externals.js --prod --project client-a --single-bundle --output-hashing none --output-path src/assets/micro-frontends/client-a
scripts.build:client-b:externals: ng build --extra-webpack-config webpack.externals.js --prod --project client-b --single-bundle --output-hashing none --output-path src/assets/micro-frontends/client-b
scripts.build:all:externals: npm run build:client-a:externals && npm run build:client-b:externals && npm run build:shell:externals
scripts.build:ssr: npm run build:client-and-server-bundles && npm run compile:server
scripts.build:client-and-server-bundles: ng build client-a  && ng run client-a:server:production --bundleDependencies all
